mapper.select: select uc.user_coupon_id, uc.used_status, c.coupon_name, c.discount_rate from user_coupon uc JOIN coupon c on c.coupon_id = uc.coupon_id where used_status = 1 AND uc.user_id = #{userId} GROUP BY uc.coupon_id, uc.user_id, uc.issued_date, uc.expiry_date
select COUNT(*) from user_coupon uc where used_status = 1 AND uc.user_id = #{userId}
